== Discrete Math ==
=== Catalan ===
# C(n) = C(2n, n) / (n + 1)
# C(n) = Sum{C(i) * C(n - 1 - i)}  i âˆˆ [0, n)
       = C(0)C(n-1)+C(1)C(n-2)+...+C(n-2)C(1)+C(0)
# C(n) = 2 * (2n - 1) / (n + 1) * C(n - 1)
# C(n+1) = 2*(2n+1)/(n+2)*C(n)

C(0)=1
C(1)=1
C(2)=2
C(3)=5
C(4)=14
C(5)=42
C(6)=132

C(1)=2*(2*0+1)/(0+2)*C(0)=2*1/2*C(0)=1
C(2)=2*(2*1+1)/(1+2)*C(1)=2*3/3*C(1)=2
C(3)=2*(2*2+1)/(2+2)*C(2)=2*5/4*C(2)=5
C(4)=2*(2*3+1)/(3+2)*C(3)=2*7/5*C(3)=14
C(5)=2*(2*4+1)/(3+2)*C(4)=2*9/6*C(4)=42
C(6)=2*(2*5+1)/(4+2)*C(5)=2*11/7*C(5)=132
C(7)=2*(2*6+1)/(5+2)*C(6)=2*13/8*C(6)=429
